mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ENTERPRISE ( ENTERPRISE_ID, ENTERPRISE_PW, ENTERPRISE_NAME, ENTERPRISE_ADDRESS, ENTERPRISE_REGINUM, ENTERPRISE_MANAGERNAME, ENTERPRISE_MANAGERPHONE, ENTERPRISE_MANAGEREMAIL, ENTERPRISE_ETC, ENTERPRISE_CODE ) VALUES ( #{enterprise_ID}, #{enterprise_PW}, #{enterprise_Name}, #{enterprise_Address}, #{enterprise_RegiNum}, #{enterprise_ManagerName}, #{enterprise_ManagerPhone}, #{enterprise_ManagerEmail}, #{enterprise_ETC}, #{enterprise_Code} )
mapper.select: SELECT ENTERPRISE_ID, ENTERPRISE_PW, ENTERPRISE_NAME, ENTERPRISE_ADDRESS, ENTERPRISE_REGINUM, ENTERPRISE_MANAGERNAME, ENTERPRISE_MANAGERPHONE, ENTERPRISE_MANAGEREMAIL, ENTERPRISE_ETC, ENTERPRISE_CODE, ENTERPRISE_PERMISSION FROM ENTERPRISE WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID=#{enterprise_ID} AND ENTERPRISE_PW=#{enterprise_PW}
mapper.update: UPDATE ENTERPRISE SET ENTERPRISE_PW=#{enterprise_PW}, ENTERPRISE_NAME=#{enterprise_Name}, ENTERPRISE_ADDRESS=#{enterprise_Address}, ENTERPRISE_REGINUM=#{enterprise_RegiNum}, ENTERPRISE_MANAGERNAME=#{enterprise_ManagerName}, ENTERPRISE_MANAGERPHONE=ENTERPRISE_MANAGERPHONE, ENTERPRISE_MANAGEREMAIL=#{enterprise_ManagerEmail}, ENTERPRISE_ETC=#{enterprise_ETC}, ENTERPRISE_CODE=#{enterprise_Code} WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID=#{enterprise_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT ENTERPRISE_ID, ENTERPRISE_PW, ENTERPRISE_NAME, ENTERPRISE_ADDRESS, ENTERPRISE_REGINUM, ENTERPRISE_MANAGERNAME, ENTERPRISE_MANAGERPHONE, ENTERPRISE_MANAGEREMAIL, ENTERPRISE_ETC, ENTERPRISE_CODE FROM ENTERPRISE WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID=#{enterprise_ID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ENTERPRISEBOARD( ENTERPRISEBOARD_SEQ ,ENTERPRISE_ID ,ENTERPRISEBOARD_TITLE ,ENTERPRISEBOARD_CONTENT ,ENTERPRISEBOARD_INDATE ,ENTERPRISEBOARD_HITCOUNT ) VALUES ( ENTERPRISEBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,#{enterprise_ID} ,#{enterpriseBoard_Title} ,#{enterpriseBoard_Content} ,SYSDATE ,0 )
mapper.select: SELECT ENTERPRISEBOARD_SEQ ,ENTERPRISE_ID ,ENTERPRISEBOARD_TITLE ,ENTERPRISEBOARD_CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(ENTERPRISEBOARD_INDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS enterpriseBoard_Indate ,ENTERPRISEBOARD_HITCOUNT FROM ENTERPRISEBOARD

SELECT ENTERPRISEBOARD_SEQ ,ENTERPRISE_ID ,ENTERPRISEBOARD_TITLE ,ENTERPRISEBOARD_CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(ENTERPRISEBOARD_INDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS enterpriseBoard_Indate ,ENTERPRISEBOARD_HITCOUNT FROM ENTERPRISEBOARD WHERE ENTERPRISEBOARD_SEQ = #{enterpriseBoard_Seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE ENTERPRISEBOARD SET ENTERPRISEBOARD_HITCOUNT = ENTERPRISEBOARD_HITCOUNT+1 WHERE ENTERPRISEBOARD_SEQ = #{enterpriseBoard_Seq}
mapper.select: SELECT FORSALE_SEQ, FORSALE_TITLE, FORSALE_STATUS, ENTERPRISE_ID, GEOAPI_PREFECTURES, GEOAPI_CITIES, GEOAPI_TOWNS, GEOAPI_REMAIN, FORSALE_RENT, AFORSLE_DEPOSIT, FORSALE_REWARD, FORSALE_MANAGECOST, FORSALE_OPTION, FORSALE_ETC, FORSALE_INDATE, FORSALE_POSTCODE, FORSALE_HOUSETYPE, FORSALE_LAT, FORSALE_LNG FROM FORSALE WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID=#{enterprise_ID}

select f.FORSALE_SEQ as FORSALE_SEQ, FORSALE_TITLE, FORSALE_STATUS , ENTERPRISE_ID, GEOAPI_PREFECTURES, GEOAPI_CITIES, GEOAPI_TOWNS, GEOAPI_REMAIN, FORSALE_RENT, FORSALE_DEPOSIT, FORSALE_REWARD, FORSALE_MANAGECOST, FORSALE_OPTION, FORSALE_ETC, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_DATE(FORSALE_INDATE)as FORSALE_INDATE, FORSALE_POSTCODE, FORSALE_HOUSETYPE, FORSALE_LAT, FORSALE_LNG, SAVENAME, IMAGE_SEQ, ORIGINNAME from (select * from (select * from forsale order by forsale_seq desc) where 7>rownum and forsale_trade = 'N') f , (select i.IMAGE_SEQ as image_seq, i.forsale_seq as forsale_seq, originname, savename from image i , (select min(image_seq) as image_seq, forsale_seq from image group by forsale_seq) i2 where i.image_seq = i2.image_seq and i.FORSALE_SEQ = i2.forsale_seq) i where f.FORSALE_SEQ=i.FORSALE_SEQ order by f.FORSALE_SEQ desc

select f.FORSALE_SEQ as FORSALE_SEQ, FORSALE_TITLE, FORSALE_STATUS , ENTERPRISE_ID, GEOAPI_PREFECTURES, GEOAPI_CITIES, GEOAPI_TOWNS, GEOAPI_REMAIN, FORSALE_RENT, FORSALE_DEPOSIT, FORSALE_REWARD, FORSALE_MANAGECOST, FORSALE_OPTION, FORSALE_ETC, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_DATE(FORSALE_INDATE)as FORSALE_INDATE, FORSALE_POSTCODE, FORSALE_HOUSETYPE, FORSALE_LAT, FORSALE_LNG, SAVENAME, IMAGE_SEQ, ORIGINNAME from (select * from (select * from forsale order by forsale_seq desc) where 7>rownum and forsale_trade = 'N' and
forSale_HouseType='Apartment'
forSale_HouseType='House'
forSale_HouseType='Commercial'
forSale_HouseType='Garage'
forSale_HouseType='Lot' ) f , (select i.IMAGE_SEQ as image_seq, i.forsale_seq as forsale_seq, originname, savename from image i , (select min(image_seq) as image_seq, forsale_seq from image group by forsale_seq) i2 where i.image_seq = i2.image_seq and i.FORSALE_SEQ = i2.forsale_seq) i where f.FORSALE_SEQ=i.FORSALE_SEQ
order by f.FORSALE_SEQ desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ENTERPRISECOMMENT ( ENTERPRISEBOARD_SEQ, ENTERPRISE_ID, ENTERPRISECOMMENT_CONTENT, ENTERPRISECOMMENT_INDATE, ENTERPRISECOMMENT_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{enterpriseBoard_Seq}, #{enterprise_ID}, #{enterpriseComment_Content}, SYSDATE, ENTERPRISECOMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL )
mapper.select: SELECT ENTERPRISEBOARD_SEQ, ENTERPRISE_ID, ENTERPRISECOMMENT_CONTENT, ENTERPRISECOMMENT_INDATE, ENTERPRISECOMMENT_SEQ FROM ENTERPRISECOMMENT WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID=#{enterprise_ID} AND ENTERPRISEBOARD_SEQ=#{enterpriseBoard_Seq} ORDER BY ENTERPRISECOMMENT_INDATE DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ENTERPRISEBOARD WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID=#{enterprise_ID} AND ENTERPRISEBOARD_SEQ=#{enterpriseBoard_Seq}
mapper.select: select f.FORSALE_SEQ as FORSALE_SEQ, FORSALE_TITLE, FORSALE_STATUS , ENTERPRISE_ID, GEOAPI_PREFECTURES, GEOAPI_CITIES, GEOAPI_TOWNS, GEOAPI_REMAIN, FORSALE_RENT, FORSALE_DEPOSIT, FORSALE_REWARD, FORSALE_MANAGECOST, FORSALE_OPTION, FORSALE_ETC, TO_CHAR(FORSALE_INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FORSALE_INDATE, FORSALE_POSTCODE, FORSALE_HOUSETYPE, FORSALE_LAT, FORSALE_LNG, SAVENAME, IMAGE_SEQ, ORIGINNAME from (select * from (select * from forsale order by forsale_seq desc) where ENTERPRISE_ID=#{enterprise_ID}) f , (select i.IMAGE_SEQ as image_seq, i.forsale_seq as forsale_seq, originname, savename from image i , (select min(image_seq) as image_seq, forsale_seq from image group by forsale_seq) i2 where i.image_seq = i2.image_seq and i.FORSALE_SEQ = i2.forsale_seq) i where f.FORSALE_SEQ=i.FORSALE_SEQ order by f.FORSALE_SEQ desc
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FORSALE WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID=#{enterprise_ID} AND FORSALE_SEQ=#{forSale_Seq}
mapper.select: select FORSALE_SEQ, FORSALE_TITLE, FORSALE_STATUS, ENTERPRISE_ID, GEOAPI_PREFECTURES, GEOAPI_CITIES, GEOAPI_TOWNS, GEOAPI_REMAIN, FORSALE_RENT, FORSALE_DEPOSIT, FORSALE_REWARD, FORSALE_MANAGECOST, FORSALE_OPTION, FORSALE_ETC, FORSALE_INDATE, FORSALE_POSTCODE, FORSALE_HOUSETYPE, FORSALE_LAT, FORSALE_LNG from FORSALE where FORSALE_SEQ=#{forSale_Seq}
select IMAGE_SEQ, FORSALE_SEQ, ORIGINNAME, SAVENAME from image where FORSALE_SEQ=#{forSale_Seq}

SELECT ENTERPRISE_ID ,ENTERPRISE_PW ,ENTERPRISE_NAME ,ENTERPRISE_ADDRESS ,ENTERPRISE_REGINUM ,ENTERPRISE_MANAGERNAME ,ENTERPRISE_MANAGERPHONE ,ENTERPRISE_MANAGEREMAIL ,ENTERPRISE_ETC FROM ENTERPRISE WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID= #{enterprise_ID}

SELECT RESERVATION_SEQ ,R.ENTERPRISE_ID as ENTERPRISE_ID ,CUSTOMER_ID ,R.FORSALE_SEQ as FORSALE_SEQ ,RESERVATION_VISA ,RESERVATION_GUARANTOR ,RESERVATION_INDATE ,RESERVATION_COMPLETE ,FORSALE_TITLE ,GEOAPI_PREFECTURES ,GEOAPI_CITIES ,GEOAPI_TOWNS ,GEOAPI_REMAIN ,FORSALE_STATUS ,FORSALE_RENT FROM RESERVATION R, FORSALE F WHERE RESERVATION_COMPLETE='W' AND R.ENTERPRISE_ID=#{enterprise_ID} AND F.forsale_seq=R.forsale_seq
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET RESERVATION_COMPLETE='Y' WHERE RESERVATION_SEQ=#{reservation_Seq}
mapper.select: SELECT RESERVATION_SEQ ,R.ENTERPRISE_ID as ENTERPRISE_ID ,R.CUSTOMER_ID ,R.FORSALE_SEQ as FORSALE_SEQ ,RESERVATION_VISA ,RESERVATION_GUARANTOR ,RESERVATION_INDATE ,RESERVATION_COMPLETE ,FORSALE_TITLE ,GEOAPI_PREFECTURES ,GEOAPI_CITIES ,GEOAPI_TOWNS ,GEOAPI_REMAIN ,FORSALE_STATUS ,FORSALE_RENT ,CUSTOMER_EMAIL FROM RESERVATION R, FORSALE F, CUSTOMER C WHERE RESERVATION_COMPLETE='Y' AND R.ENTERPRISE_ID=#{enterprise_ID} AND F.forsale_seq=R.forsale_seq AND R.CUSTOMER_ID = C.CUSTOMER_ID AND F.FORSALE_TRADE = 'N'

SELECT RESERVATION_SEQ ,R.ENTERPRISE_ID as ENTERPRISE_ID ,R.CUSTOMER_ID ,R.FORSALE_SEQ as FORSALE_SEQ ,RESERVATION_VISA ,RESERVATION_GUARANTOR ,RESERVATION_INDATE ,RESERVATION_COMPLETE ,FORSALE_TITLE ,GEOAPI_PREFECTURES ,GEOAPI_CITIES ,GEOAPI_TOWNS ,GEOAPI_REMAIN ,FORSALE_STATUS ,FORSALE_RENT ,FORSALE_DEPOSIT ,FORSALE_REWARD ,CUSTOMER_EMAIL FROM RESERVATION R, FORSALE F, CUSTOMER C WHERE RESERVATION_COMPLETE='Y' AND R.ENTERPRISE_ID=#{enterprise_ID} AND F.forsale_seq=R.forsale_seq AND F.FORSALE_TRADE = 'Y' AND R.CUSTOMER_ID = C.CUSTOMER_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET RESERVATION_COMPLETE = 'N' WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = #{customer_ID} AND RESERVATION_SEQ = #{customer_ID}
UPDATE FORSALE SET FORSALE_TRADE = 'Y' ,FORSALE_TRADEINDATE = SYSDATE WHERE FORSALE_SEQ = #{forSale_Seq}
mapper.select: select f.FORSALE_SEQ as FORSALE_SEQ ,FORSALE_TITLE ,FORSALE_STATUS ,ENTERPRISE_ID ,GEOAPI_PREFECTURES ,GEOAPI_CITIES ,GEOAPI_TOWNS ,GEOAPI_REMAIN ,FORSALE_RENT ,FORSALE_DEPOSIT ,FORSALE_REWARD ,FORSALE_MANAGECOST ,FORSALE_OPTION ,FORSALE_ETC ,FORSALE_INDATE ,FORSALE_POSTCODE ,FORSALE_HOUSETYPE ,FORSALE_LAT ,FORSALE_LNG ,FORSALE_SUBWAY ,FORSALE_SUBWAYDISTANCE ,FORSALE_SUBWAYDISTANCE2 ,FORSALE_HITCOUNT ,FORSALE_TRADE ,IMAGE_SEQ ,ORIGINNAME ,SAVENAME from forsale f, (select i.IMAGE_SEQ as image_seq, i.forsale_seq as forsale_seq, originname, savename from image i , (select min(image_seq) as image_seq, forsale_seq from image group by forsale_seq) i2 where i.image_seq = i2.image_seq and i.FORSALE_SEQ = i2.forsale_seq) i where f.forsale_seq=i.forsale_seq order by f.FORSALE_HITCOUNT DESC
